testcase.name: Create new contact in CRM scenario - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User is already on login page.........................................passed Then User enters "SriMore" and "pass@123"...................................passed Then User clicks on login button............................................passed Then User is now on home page...............................................passed Then User moves to new contact page.........................................passed Then User enters new contact details "Srinivas" and "kam" and "more"........passed Then Close the browser......................................................passed
